mapper.insert: insert into ps_member(authority, birth, grade, name, gender, korean_score, english_score, math_score, scoreAvg, email, password, status) values(#{authority},#{birth},#{grade},#{name},#{gender},#{koreanScore},#{englishScore},#{mathScore},#{scoreAvg},#{email},sha1(#{password}),#{status})
mapper.select: select member_no, authority, birth, name, gender, email, status from ps_member order by member_no asc
select member_no, authority, birth, grade, name, gender, korean_score, english_score, math_score, scoreAvg, email, status, created_date from ps_member where member_no=#{no}

select member_no, authority, birth, grade, name, gender, korean_score, english_score, math_score, scoreAvg, email, status, created_date from ps_member where email=#{email} and password=sha1(#{password})
mapper.update: update ps_member set birth=#{birth}, grade=#{grade}, name=#{name}, gender=#{gender}, korean_score=#{koreanScore}, english_score=#{englishScore}, math_score=#{mathScore}, scoreAvg=#{scoreAvg}, email=#{email}, password=sha1(#{password}), status=#{status} where member_no=#{no}
